content: the simplicity scarf is simple in it s creation but gorgeous in it s finish with a deep hood to keep your head warm and stripes along the edges this crochet hooded scarf packs a punch of personality in simple stitches this scarf looks great on all genders this pattern for a crochet scarf with hood includes written instructions for both a one size fits all adult and child size these sizes should be big enough/long enough for everyone but because we all deserve our perfect fit i ve included instructions on how to measure yourself and figure out how to create this crochet hooded scarf perfect for you or your giftee looks great in any colors and especially in bright rainbow colors for children this is sure to be a favorite **skill level ** easy/ advanced beginner - this crochet hooded scarf pattern uses simple stitches such as chains and half_double_crochet the majority of crocheting this pattern should be easy the hood is worked directly onto the scarf so some counting will be necessary but it s nothing too difficult using surface slip_stitch to create the stripes on the scarf is the most advanced technique used in this pattern however they are fairly straight forward as they re creating long lines and will work quickly once you get used to them how to surface slip_stitch is explained within the pattern the stripes are completely optional of course so you can omit them if you prefer **pattern includes ** this crochet hooded scarf pattern pdf includes one size fits all for both child and adult sizes it includes detailed information on how to finish the scarf including the stripes and fringe this pattern also includes several pages of information on how to find your perfect size this includes how to find what size you are how to figure out the number of stitches formulas for the math etc **terms used ** us standard pattern is written in english **size ** child size approximately 39 inches long scarf and 9 inches high hood adult size approximately 70 inches long scarf and 11 inches high hood **materials required ** for this crochet hooded scarf pattern you will need a medium 4 weight yarn of your choice you will need approximately adult 10 ounces/ 284 grams/500 yards child 6 ounces/ 171 grams/ 300 yards yarn used i love this yarn this is an aran medium weight which means it s on the heavier side of medium **tools ** 5 mm h-8 hook tapestry needle scissors stitch markers make sure to tag me in your instagram photos so i can show you some love i m @theloopholefoxcrochet or use #theloopholefoxcrochet i hope you love the simplicity scarf as much as i do happy crocheting the loophole fox
